focuses.label: Biology
focuses.description: Research execution and workflow optimization across virology, assay operations, and lab systems discipline.

focuses.label: Data Science
focuses.description: Data ingestion and analysis pipelines for market intelligence, backfills, and model-ready datasets.

focuses.label: Software Systems
focuses.description: Operational software delivery across product implementation, automation, and business tooling.

projects.title: Kalshi AWS Ingest
projects.summary: Distributed ingest architecture for historical candlestick market data using AWS EC2 workers.
projects.problem: Single-machine collection bottlenecked historical backfills and reduced strategy research velocity.
projects.architecture: Parallel worker orchestration on EC2 with segmented workloads and aggregation flow back to central storage.
projects.outcome: Materially reduced backfill runtime and enabled faster iteration for analysis and strategy development.

projects.title: Unified Prediction Market API
projects.summary: In-progress architecture to normalize exchange integrations into one modular API surface.
projects.problem: Exchange-specific endpoints and payload differences increase integration complexity and maintenance burden.
projects.architecture: Adapter-based abstraction with normalized entities, shared auth/rate-limit handling, and pluggable market connectors.
projects.outcome: Improves multi-market portability for strategy tooling and reduces duplicate integration code.

projects.title: VLP Process Optimization
projects.summary: Workflow optimization for virus-like particle production in mammalian systems under real lab constraints.
projects.problem: Production consistency and yield behavior required tighter control over reagent, timing, and purification variables.
projects.architecture: Iterative process tuning with standardized run conditions, controlled comparisons, and documentation discipline.
projects.outcome: Improved reproducibility and clearer run-to-run operational baselines for ongoing platform work.

projects.title: Dengue Assay Workflow Support
projects.summary: Assay workflow support and research operations for dengue correlate investigation and experimental throughput.
projects.problem: High-volume assay cycles require process consistency, clean lineage tracking, and robust execution hygiene.
projects.architecture: Operational lab support with SOP-aligned execution, instrumentation readiness, and structured data capture.
projects.outcome: Supported stable execution cadence and analysis-ready outputs for ongoing research programs.

projects.title: Logical Books Platform
projects.summary: Two-part system: a public business website plus a locally hosted internal bookkeeping application.
projects.problem: Needed a straightforward bookkeeping workflow and external credibility site without heavyweight infrastructure.
projects.architecture: Separated architecture with (1) a public-facing business website for positioning and lead conversion, and (2) a locally hosted Flask web app backed by SQLite for internal bookkeeping operations.
projects.outcome: Delivered both external market presence and practical internal finance tooling in a cohesive project.

projects.title: DNS by SSID Automation
projects.summary: Config-driven utility that applies DNS policy automatically based on current Wi-Fi network.
projects.problem: Manual DNS switching across changing environments created repeated operational friction.
projects.architecture: SSID mapping rules with deterministic profile application and repeatable CLI execution.
projects.outcome: Reduced context-switch overhead and improved reliability for network-dependent workflows.
